00003 class Docs_Controller extends sController {
00004         private $user;
00005         private $data;
00006         function  __construct($controller) {
00007                 $this->user = new sUser();
00008                 $this->data = array();
00009                 $this->data['loggedIn'] = false;
00010                 if($this->user->loggedIn()) {
00011                         $this->data['loggedIn'] = true;
00012                 }
00013                 parent::__construct($controller);
00014                 $this->loadModel('Doc');
00015         }
00016         function index() {
00017                 $this->data['files'] = $this->Doc->getFiles();
00018                 $this->template->render('index', $this->data);
00019         }
00020         function display($file='') {
00021                 $this->data['methods'] = $this->Doc->getDocs($file);
00022                 if(!$this->data['methods']){
00023                         $this->data['methods'] = array();
00024                         $this->data['error'] = 'There is no documentation for this file yet!';
00025                 }
00026                 $this->data['header'] = 'Documentation - ' . $file . '.php';
00027                 $this->template->render('display', $this->data);
00028         }
00029         function create($file='') {
00030                 if(!$this->user->loggedIn()) {
00031                         redirect('users/login');
00032                 }
00033                 if($_POST) {
00034                         $methodName = $this->post('method_name');
00035                         $comments = $this->post('comments');
00036                         $example = $this->post('example');
00037                         $file = $this->post('file');
00038                         $id = $this->Doc->create($methodName, $comments, $example, $file);
00039                         redirect('/docs/update/'.$id.'/created');
00040                 } else {
00041                         if($file){
00042                                 $this->data['file'] = $file;
00043                         }
00044                         $this->template->render('create', $this->data);
00045                 }
00046                 
00047         }
00048         function update($id='', $created=false) {
00049                 if(!$this->user->loggedIn()) {
00050                         redirect('users/login');
00051                 }
00052                 $this->data['doc'] = array();
00053                 if($created){
00054                         $this->data['message'] = 'Documentation created';
00055                 }
00056                 if(!$id) {
00057                         $this->data['error'] = 'No id provided';
00058                 }
00059                 if($_POST){
00060                         $methodName = $this->post('method_name');
00061                         $comments = $this->post('comments');
00062                         $example = $this->post('example');
00063                         $file = $this->post('file');
00064                         $this->Doc->update($id, $methodName, $comments, $example, $file);
00065                         $this->data['message'] = 'Documentation updated!';
00066                 }
00067                 if($id){
00068                         $this->data['doc'] = $this->Doc->getDoc($id);
00069                 }
00070                 $this->template->render('update', $this->data);
00071         }
00072         function delete($id=''){
00073                 if(!$this->user->loggedIn()) {
00074                         redirect('users/login');
00075                 }
00076                 if(!$id) {
00077                         $this->data['error'] = 'No id provided';
00078                 } else {
00079                         $this->Doc->delete($id);
00080                         $this->data['message'] = 'Documentation deleted!';
00081                 }
00082                 $this->template->render('delete', $this->data);
00083         }
